post.description:
Use this endpoint to confirm your last generated quote for your selected shipping method (Ankorstore or Custom).

If you are shipping with custom (your own carrier) you may provide the tracking details that will then be passed onto the retailer.

orderShippingOverview.title: Order Resource -> Shipping Overview
orderShippingOverview.description: Contains all information related to either shipping method (`ankorstore` or `custom`). This field is ONLY included when fetching a single order at a time.

availableShippingMethods.description: Available shipping methods to use. Custom is ship with your own carrier outside of Ankorstore.

shipToAddress.description: The address the order needs to be shipped to

expectedShippingDates.description: The minimum and maximum expected shipping dates

provider.description: The company providing the shipping service

link.description: A URL to view the tracking status

latestQuote.description:
The quote is the price of the parcel(s) shipping.
If this object is null then no quote has been generated.

id.description: Id of the last quote generated. Every time a ship call is done, a new calculation is made based on parcels dimensions and weight sent

provider.description:
Provider responsible for the calculation. If custom, the calculation is done by Ankorstore and refunded.
If any other, the calculation is done by the provider and the shipping price is covered by Ankorstore (most of the case, see shippingCostsOverview section).

rateProvider.description: The provider of the rate for `rateAmount`.

rateAmount.description: Amount calculated for the parcels provided.

amount.x-sl-error-message: You do not have permission to view this reference

shippingCostsOverview.description: Overview of costs related to shipping. This object is displayed only if a shipping cost fee or a refund exists

amount.x-sl-error-message: You do not have permission to view this reference

type.description:
Type of shipping costs:
If type = `refund` the amount will be refunded to the brand (added to brand net amount).
if type = `fee` the amount will be subtracted from brand net amount as a contribution to shipping costs.

pickup.description: The scheduled pickup, requires an API call to be made after the shipping labels have been generated.

closeTime.description: Close time (pickup required to happen before this time) Eg: 13:00:00

externalReferenceId.description: The reference number for this pickup

tracking.description: The tracking details for the overall shipment

eta.description: The estimated time of arrival for the order

trackingNumber.description: The tracking number of the order

trackingLink.description: The tracking link for the order

type.description:
The `ankorstore_fees` type will be a negative amount which reduces the total amount paid to the brand.
The `shipping_fees` type also reduces the amount paid to the brand (but will be a positive value).
The `brand_shipping_fees_refund` type is positive and adds to the total amount paid.

currency.description: The currency of the billing item

vatRate.description: The VAT percentage rate of the billing item, (from 0 - 100).

currencyRate.description: If the currency is not in EUR, this is the conversion rate used
